item.description:
it was a cool, still night in the early autumn of 2005. a man sat in his darkened living room, silhouetted against the soft glow of his computer monitor. his fingers tapped softly on the keyboard, the word "Meetup" appeared on the screen, and with a final stroke of his pinky finger on the enter key history was made and a legacy began.....

that man was Matt Silva, the date was October 8, 2005, and the legacy he created (and, sadly, left behind when he moved on to greener pastures -- literally) is what we know and love as the New Haven Collective.

so come out to toast yourself and each other in true NHC style on this squalling tot's second birthday. our location is Castaways. perhaps not our most frequented happy hour establishment, but a damned good one. plenty of parking across the street for the motorists among us, and Frank is going to give us use of both the outside patio if the weather's fine and the huge bar room to the left of the entrance if it's frightful.

as last time there will be some free comestibles on hand, and the following drink specials:

- $2 draft beer (to commemorate 2 years!)
- $4 martinis (in anticipation of 2+ more!)
- $3 LandShark Lagers (just because!)

questions? comments? email or call your contact for this event: Ben (203) 554-5144
item.name: Mon. 10/8 - NHC 2nd Anniversary Happy Hour @ Castaways!
